content: Hi. Thank you for gwtting back to me. I am not confortable calling voters due to a stutter and do not have any social media influence so I am not really finding anythng I can do at the pinned sites. Any ideas?

Sure! I get that, totally <:blueheart:1252803082849488956>  If you want to help run our Zoom phonebanks, I think that VOTE Team Chat Captain might be a good fit. That job is essentially hyping folks up, posting the links and other information needed to run the phone bank, and answering general questions. Would you like me to grab you the link for that training?

Oh! We have a sub-section of the Online Engagement team that works with the community notes on Twitter to counter the *abundance* of misinformation there. That might be a good fit and is something you can do more on your own time!
If you're more of a creative type, we also have a "Content Brigade." I can tag in someone who knows more about that if it sounds like that might be more your speed.
sure! I would like that. thanks!!!

Awesome! Thank you so much! ü•∞You can head over to <#1260651617867399188> and react üê£ to the message there to get your role! The lovely folks in <#1250550849998946417> and <#1260333091319451660> will be able to answer any questions you may have, but feel free to reach out here too if you need anything! ‚ù§Ô∏è
I looked and responded with the computer emoji bc that looks more interesting to me. Ist hat ok>

Of course! You can click as many of those emojis as you want to. Most of us volunteer in multiple areas and you're welcome to participate in whichever areas work best for you.
Since you signed up to connect with your online community, I would encourage you to take the training for that as soon as you can:
Part 1: https://events.democrats.org/event/615101/
Part 2: https://events.democrats.org/event/647793/

We also have a weekly online messaging briefing on Tuesdays, which you can sign up for here: https://events.democrats.org/event/616415/

As always, I and the rest of the mod team are here to help if you need anything! <:blueheart:1252803082849488956>
